user_instruction: 'Tell Jane to send an email to me (hr@globaldynamics.com) discussing John Smith'"'"'s candidacy, and remind her to review her Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for John Smith’s Candidacy Details

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send an email to hr@globaldynamics.com outlining your assessment of John Smith’s suitability for the role at Tech Innovations? 

When preparing the summary, kindly review any relevant information in your Gmail and Notion to ensure we have the most up-to-date insights.

Thank you very much for your time and assistance. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
HR Department  
Global Dynamics

final_output:
